titleStmt.title: A publication, or a declaration of the lords of the councells order for the needle-makers of His Maiesties dominions
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Privy Council.

notesStmt.note: "At Whitehall the XX. of Ianuary. Anno. 1623. Present, Lord Keeper, &c. Lord President, Lord Marquis Hamilton, Earle Marshall. Lord Chamberlaine, Lord Viscount Grandison, Lord Carew, Lord Chichester, Master Treasurer, Master Secretarie Caluert, The Master of the Rolles."
Reproduction of original in: Society of Antiquaries.
